page.title: 12A day in my life (cont.)
page.content: The morning lesson begins with maths or English until 12.00p.m. with a twenty minute break at 10.40a.m. For lunch I have sandwiches. Cheese and Branston Pickle is my favourite. I don't go outside at lunchbreak, instead I read my book. In the afternoon we usualy do project work, Art and Craft or Games. We finish school at 3.30p.m.I walk home with my friend, and get home at 3.45p.m.I go inside and upstairs to change,then I go downstairs for tea. I always have something different, as variety is the spice of life. I usually read until 7.30p.m. and watch television until 8.30p.m.
